title: Day 4: Podium, Party of Two
description:
Training, performing and winning is better done with those we love. And that extends right up to sharing the podiums steps. 

Madison Chock and Evan Bates are creating love stories on and off the ice, and now on Olympic podiums. Jaelin Kauf stood on a mogul podium with her mom as a toddler and has turned that support into an Olympic Silver. 

Follow The Podium now on Apple Podcasts to get automatic downloads. And tune into the networks of NBC to watch every moment of the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympic games.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Sports)
